text: Swatting is a form of cybercrime. It involves calling the police on someone and claiming that they are going to commit a crime. Swatting can result in death. Countermeasures: In 2023, the FBI said that it would create a database (about swatting incidents, or) to track swattings. The FBI was also said it would improve information-sharing with local police agencies (or police departments). ==References== Category:Types of crime
title: Swatting
